definition: to go for an outing/to go on an excursion

sentences.english: We left there at 5:00pm, and we were all very happy for this excursion.
sentences.chinese: 我們下午5點離開，我們都在這次郊遊中玩得很高興。

sentences.english: The picnic was put off until next Sunday.
We will picnic in mountain of Yangming.
We will put off the outing until next week, when we won’t be so busy.
sentences.chinese: 我們把郊遊推遲到下星期，那時我們就不會這兒忙了。

sentences.english: I see. Casual clothes are good for outings.
sentences.chinese: 我明白了，便服有利於郊遊。

sentences.english: Teachers often chaperon their classes on field trips.
sentences.chinese: 在野外郊遊時老師常看護着班上的學生。

sentences.english: We have one family meal or outing a week.
sentences.chinese: 每週我們會有一次家庭聚餐或郊遊。

sentences.english: Wolves have smiles on three little pigs to please go outing.
sentences.chinese: 野狼只好滿臉堆笑地請三隻小豬一起去郊遊。

sentences.english: One spring day the school arranged a picnic.
sentences.chinese: 有一年春天，學校安排了一次野炊郊遊。

sentences.english: The mid-term exams have finished, in which case we can plan for an outgoing.
sentences.chinese: 既然期中考試已經結束，那我們可以考慮出去郊遊了。

sentences.english: We often go for an outing in the country on fine days in spring and autumn.
They reached a fragile accord on weekend outings.
sentences.chinese: 關於週末郊遊他們達成了脆弱的一致意見。

sentences.english: It was during the trip that Yu reportedly drove the car off the cliff.
sentences.chinese: 報道稱正是在這次郊遊中餘將車開到懸崖下。

sentences.english: After the Games are over, we will have more choices for a geta- way on weekends.
sentences.chinese: 在亞運會結束後，你將多出許多的週末郊遊選擇。

sentences.english: Teachers often chaperon their classes on field trips.
sentences.chinese: 在野外郊遊時教員常看護着班上的學生。

sentences.english: Last wook we were so burdcned with homework that now we were delighted to be having an outing.
sentences.chinese: 上星期的作業太重，現在能出來郊遊，真是太高興了。

definition: to amuse oneself/to have fun/to go sightseeing/to take a stroll
to fish (with line and hook)/to dupe
to go on a tour/to have an outing
to go on a scenic tour
time/period during the day/one of the 12 two-hour periods enumerated by the earthly branches 地支
